mapper.sql: LSBH, xh, zzpbh, qxdlx, qswz, zzwz, sfqc, sfgl, glyy, sfpbl, blyy, lastUpdateTime, lastUpdateAccountId
mapper.update:
update sc_ls_qxqc
zzpbh = #{zzpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qxdlx = #{qxdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qswz = #{qswz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
zzwz = #{zzwz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
sfqc = #{sfqc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sfgl = #{sfgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
glyy = #{glyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sfpbl = #{sfpbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blyy = #{blyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastUpdateAccountId = #{lastUpdateAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LSBH = #{lsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and xh = #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sc_ls_qxqc set zzpbh = #{zzpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qxdlx = #{qxdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qswz = #{qswz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, zzwz = #{zzwz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sfqc = #{sfqc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfgl = #{sfgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, glyy = #{glyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfpbl = #{sfpbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blyy = #{blyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUpdateAccountId = #{lastUpdateAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LSBH = #{lsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and xh = #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into sc_ls_qxqc (LSBH, xh, zzpbh, qxdlx, qswz, zzwz, sfqc, sfgl, glyy, sfpbl, blyy, lastUpdateTime, lastUpdateAccountId) values
(#{item.lsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.zzpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qxdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qswz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.zzwz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sfqc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sfgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.glyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sfpbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.blyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdateAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select t2.ZZPCD - t1.zzwz 'startPos', t2.ZZPCD - t1.qswz 'endPos', t1.zzwz - t1.qswz 'slitterLen', t1.LSBH 'fiberDrawingNum', t1.qxdlx 'defectType', t1.qswz 'fiberDrawingStartPos', t1.zzwz 'fiberDrawingEndPos', t1.sfqc 'isExcision', t1.sfgl 'isIsolation', t1.glyy 'isolationReason', t1.sfpbl 'isDefective', t1.blyy 'defectiveReason' from sc_ls_qxqc t1 inner join sc_ls1 t2 on t1.LSBH = t2.LSBH and t2.ZZPBH = #{fiberDiskNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by xh desc;
